title: On US visit, Dutch politician talks importance of ASML, China trade
description: ASML is the largest supplier of equipment to computer chip makers. Earlier this month, the Netherlands government began requiring export licenses for more of ASML's product range to China, following pressure from the US.
content: On a visit to Washington, the Netherlands' economy minister on Monday underlined the importance of China as a trading partner and repeated that Dutch semiconductor equipment maker ASML must be allowed to "do business as freely as possible." Dirk Beljaarts underlined that his meeting with U.S. Deputy Secretary of Commerce Don Graves was to promote bilateral trade, not to negotiate over export restrictions, which do not fall under his purview. Why it's important  Beljaarts' visit comes ahead of an expected expansion of U.S. rules restricting semiconductor exports to certain computer chip plants in China. Context
cleaned_content: on a visit to washington the netherlands economy minister on monday underlined the importance of china as a trading partner and repeated that dutch semiconductor equipment maker asml must be allowed to do business as freely as possible dirk beljaarts underlined that his meeting with u s deputy secretary of commerce don graves was to promote bilateral trade not to negotiate over export restrictions which do not fall under his purview why its important beljaarts visit comes ahead of an expected expansion of u s rules restricting semiconductor exports to certain computer chip plants in china context
